All available Search Types

Index

Search Type

0

First letter each word from start (Gurmukhi)

1

First letter each word anywhere (Gurmukhi) [Default]

2

Full Word (Gurmukhi)

3

Full Word Translation (English)

4

Romanized Gurmukhi (English)

5

Ang

6

Main Letter (Gurmukhi)

7

Romanized first letter anywhere (English)

The above provided indices can be used in Search function to narrow exploration.
